pullrequest.title: [gz11]Support for Levels: Add and remove entities

content.raw: This is ready for review. There is one issue that's still not resolved regarding the removal of entities. Trying to destroy entities (uncommenting [Scene3d.cc:755](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/182/gz11-wip-support-for-levels-add-and-remove/diff?w=1#Lsrc/plugins/Scene3D.ccT755) and [Scene3d.cc:771](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/182/gz11-wip-support-for-levels-add-and-remove/diff?w=1#Lsrc/plugins/Scene3D.ccT771)) causes a segfault. If @iche033 or anyone else knows how to fix it, I would be very grateful :slight_smile:
content.html: This is ready for review. There is one issue that's still not resolved regarding the removal of entities. Trying to destroy entities (uncommenting Scene3d.cc:755 and Scene3d.cc:771) causes a segfault. If @iche033 or anyone else knows how to fix it, I would be very grateful
